message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $115. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very useful. Let me know what you think!

Hi Alice, I appreciate the offer, but $115 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable paying. Would you be willing to go down to $105?  I'm really interested in the product, and I think this price would be fair for both of us.

Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal, and I appreciate your interest. I can't go all the way down to $105, but I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110.  This is still a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll be happy with the product.

Alice, thanks for being flexible.  $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to go up to $108, which is right in the middle between our last offers. If you're open to that, I'm ready to finalize the deal.
